events.message: Customer reported a two-car collision resulting in rear-end damage to their vehicle. Incident happened at a traffic light intersection.
Claim has been categorised as an auto accident involving collision-related vehicle damage requiring inspection.
Insurance agent assigned to the case to manage communication, documentation, and follow-up on the motor vehicle accident claim.
Customer notified that their auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged and is now being processed.
Request sent for vehicle repair estimates, police report, and photographic evidence of the collision and damage sustained.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report, repair quotes, and photos of the car damage.
Investigation initiated to verify collision circumstances, assess vehicle damage, and confirm liability aspects.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of claim legitimacy and assessment of damage extent suitable for repair.
A settlement offer based on repair estimates and policy coverage was officially proposed to the claimant.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with claim handling so far.
The claim was formally approved by the claims department following customer agreement on the settlement.
Settlement payment was issued to the customer to cover the repair costs as per the agreed claim terms.
Auto accident claim was successfully closed after full payment issuance and final confirmation from the claimant.
